fields.name: TimeAfterCreate
fields.description: The time duration after key creation to rotate the key. It only applies to rotate. It will be in ISO 8601 duration format. Eg: 'P90D', 'P1Y'.

fields.name: TimeBeforeExpiry
fields.description: The time duration before key expiring to rotate or notify. It will be in ISO 8601 duration format. Eg: 'P90D', 'P1Y'.
